Following Test Driven Development and […]

The post Manjit Singh appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
item.content:encoded:
I am a Senior Web Applications Engineer with extensive experience in building high quality web applications.

In my 8+ years of career I have worked and created diverse web applications including Learning management systems, Memebership portals,Booking portals, Back Ends, Job baard website, Web Portals / eCommerce and a lot more.

Following Test Driven Development and Object Oriented best practices I strive to deliver well designed and robust solutions to my clients.
I have experience using GIT and Subversion version control systems.

CMS: WHMCS,Wordpress, Drupal, Joomla, Thinkific, Squarespace,shopify, OsCommerce
Pogramming Language: PHP/MYSQL/JAVASCRIPT/HTML/CSS
CRM: Salesforce, ZOHO

I thank you in advance for your consideration and look forward to working with you soon.

The post Manjit Singh appeared first on Media Shop Canada.

item.title: Aman Goel
item.dc:creator: Lalit Kumar
item.description:
Lorem IpsumÂ is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

The post Aman Goel appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
item.content:encoded:
I have 5 years of successful experience in web development using PHP, MySQL and different kind of CMS and Frameworks. I’ve developed many cutom websites of different complexity and areas such as business portals, e-commerce products, news portals, etc.

Despite I prefer backend development, I’m always flexible to provide you a turn-key and high quality solution within agreed scope, terms and budget.

I’m honest, reliable and always complete my job until successful delivery and provide a post-delivery maintenance if necessary.

Contact me to resolve your problem, I’ll do my best to help you.
Looking forward for a long-term cooperation.

The post Aman Goel appeared first on Media Shop Canada.

item.title: Angrej Singh
item.dc:creator: Lalit Kumar
item.description:
Lorem IpsumÂ is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

The post Angrej Singh appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
item.content:encoded:
I’m a UX/UI designer with web & graphic design background. I’m passionate about merging interaction design, information architecture and graphic design into one usable product/applications.

Professional in Graphics Design (print and web), ui/ux design and front end development with 6+ years’ experience in Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign and Adobe XD and 8+ years’ experience in HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery.

Having an interest in a wide range of projects of graphics for print and web including flyers, brochures, infographics, stand up banners, marketing and branding materials, presentations, invest decks, books, web and print banners, UI/UX design for websites/apps and coding using HTML5, CSS and Bootstrap techniques, etc.

Able to work within boundaries of deadlines and changing priorities and to effectively communicate with clients to ensure they are on track with deadlines and other goals.

Main goals are to receive the best feedback for what I do, and to do it in the best way. Building a long-term relationship with my clients is another important target for me.

My tools:
â€¢Sketch,
â€¢Adobe Illustrator,
â€¢Adobe Photoshop,
â€¢Adobe XD,
â€¢Adobe After Effects
â€¢InVision Studio,
â€¢InVision Inspect,
â€¢Zeplin

The post Angrej Singh appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
